form1 : $u = \exp \left[ \sin(x) + \sin(y) + \sin(z) \right]$
form2 : $u = \exp \left[ \sin(x) \right] + \sin(y) + \sin(z)$
form3 : $u = \exp \left[ \sin(x) - \cos(3yz)]
